name: Get Http-Only Cookie
description: Get the value of a http-only cookie by name. This formula will only output anything meaningful server-side, and is intended to be used for SSR/proxied API requests to read http-only cookies.

arguments.name: Cookie name
arguments.description: The name of the http-only cookie you want to get the value of.

output.description: Server-side: the value of the cookie if found or null if not found. Client-side: a placeholder template string.
